bug.author: LuQQiu
bug.summary: Backup command show wrong console message and docs
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.0.0 and possible master also have the issue Describe the bug When the root mount is hdfs ./bin/alluxio fsadmin backup backup to the leader master local directory but show message that Successfully backed up journal to hdfs://...... Alluxio docs about how to run backup command should also be updated Urgency Not urgent, but may seen confusing for users
This bug happens because we change the journal backup default in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/9283>#9283</denchmark-link> and forget to change the console message and docs.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/LuQQiu>@LuQQiu</denchmark-link> Is this issue still relevant now that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/9867>#9867</denchmark-link> is closed?
